n = int(input())

t = [0] * n
x = [0] * n
y = [0] * n

for i in range(n):
    t[i], x[i], y[i] = map(int, input().split())

for i in range(1, n):
    if abs(x[i] - x[i - 1]) + abs(y[i] - y[i - 1]) > t[i] - t[i - 1]:
        print('No')
        exit()
    if (t[i] - t[i - 1]) % 2 != (abs(x[i] - x[i - 1]) + abs(y[i] - y[i - 1])) % 2:
        print('No')
        exit()

print('Yes')
